title: Google working to fix broken cameras on some Chromebooks following recent Chrome OS updates
content:
Chrome OS updates come often and are a breeze to install, but like with anything else, there’s always the potential for things to go a little bit wrong. With some recent Chrome OS updates, it seems as though some Chromebook owners have noticed their onboard cameras have broken.

more…

The post Google working to fix broken cameras on some Chromebooks following recent Chrome OS updates appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Some Chromebook owners have reported broken cameras following some recent Chrome OS updates, but a fix is coming.
